title: Studying Sociology as an adult with Sarah McLaughlin
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Sarah McLaughlin about studying Sociology as an adult through an access course. Sarah explains the structure, grading and content of the course and what students can expect. She also talks through some of the challenges of returning to the classroom as an adult especially for those that have spent some time out of education.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
